description: This repository showcases a complete machine learning project integrated with Streamlit framework for experiment tracking, model management, and reproducibility. It includes data pre-processing, model training, evaluation, and deployment-ready tracking using Streamlit.
SmallML is a three-layer Bayesian framework that enables small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to build production-grade machine learning models despite having limited customer data.

QuoreMindHP v1.0.0 es un framework robusto y sofisticado que combina machine learning clsico con anlisis estadstico de ultra-alta precisin. Su arquitectura modular permite extensiones fciles y mantenimiento sostenible. Ideal para aplicaciones que requieren precisin numrica excepcional combinada con poder predictivo del aprendizaje automtico

This project focuses on building a multi-model ransomware detection framework using both classical Machine Learning (ML) and **Deep Learning (DL) techniques.   The goal is to detect ransomware activity including zero-day variants across diverse, real-world datasets with a focus on binary (benign vs. ransomware) and family-level classification
Geospatial Machine Learning Framework for Maritime Anomaly Detection and Illegal Fishing Prevention
This project is a Machine Learning Framework

An evolving TikTok Data Analysis project developed throughout the Google Advanced Data Analytics Certificate, showcasing skills in Python, EDA, statistics, regression, and machine learning  applying each courses concepts step-by-step using the PACE framework.

A comprehensive machine learning framework for multi-step stock price forecasting using ensemble methods combining deep learning, statistical models, and gradient boosting. This project implements a sophisticated stock price forecasting system that combines multiple machine learning approache.

Build a credit risk prediction model and apply SHAP and LIME to explain global and local decisions. Compare both methods, analyze discrepancies, and produce an interpretable, regulator-friendly explanation framework for fair and transparent loan approvals.
Predict football match outcomes using the W-5 Multi-Agent AI Consensus Framework, achieving high accuracy with a blend of AI and machine learning techniques.

PhoenixAI: Revolutionizing test automation with AI.  Our intelligent framework uses machine learning, NLP, and computer vision to create unbreakable tests for UI and API, reducing maintenance and maximizing coverage.

This project implements web threat analysis using both machine learning and deep learning techniques. It leverages a variety of libraries to preprocess data, build models, and evaluate their performance. The goal is to provide a robust framework for detecting and mitigating web-based threats such as malware, phishing, and other cybersecurity risks.
A unified machine learning framework for thematic, emotional, and semantic analysis of Clarissa and Septimus narrative intertextuality in Mrs Dalloway.

Comparative study of machine learning classifiers (KNN, Weighted KNN, MLP) for industrial steel plate fault detection. Implements feature engineering with LDA/PCA dimensionality reduction, achieving 74% sensitivity and 96% specificity. Includes comprehensive data analysis, k-means clustering, and model evaluation framework.
Causal machine learning framework for pharmacovigilance signal detection in electronic health records: Drug-induced acute kidney injury

Repository for the paper Machine Learning-Based Prediction and Geometric Quality Assessment in 3D Concrete Printing. Includes experimental data, preprocessing scripts, CatBoost/DecisionTree ML models, and code for printability maps and geometric quality metrics in 3DCP.
This study predict the breast cancer tumor using machine learning algorithms and using Explainable AI frameworks such as LIME and SHAP to explain the interpretation of the ML predictions.
This repository contains the codes for the paper: "A thermoinformational framework for the description of neuropsychological systems through machine learning "

Proposed solution introduces a Machine Learning (ML) driven Battery Management System that intelligently estimates the State of Health (SOH)  and predicts the Remaining Useful Life (RUL) of EV batterie

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.
interpretable machine learning framework for pcos detection using shap and lime

Developed a hybrid machine learning framework combining PCA and Stacked Autoencoders to identify malicious data  injection attacks in smart grids. Built a real-time web monitoring dashboard using Django and MySQL, enabling data visualization of attack patterns. Improved detection accuracy and  ensuring secure and efficient smart grid operations

An AI-powered virtual mental health support system developed using the RASA framework that provides personalized therapy through chatbot interactions. It leverages NLP and machine learning to understand user emotions, offer tailored guidance, and recommend professionals.The system achieved 100% accuracy in conversation and action-level evaluations.

Developed an explainable AI framework integrating machine learning for accurate brain tumor MRI classification. Enhanced model transparency through interpretability techniques, enabling clinicians to understand decision logic and improve diagnostic reliability in medical image analysis.

ONNX (Open Neural Network Exchange) is an open standard format for representing machine learning models. It was developed by Microsoft and Facebook to allow AI models trained in one framework to be used in another.

Comprehensive quantitative analysis of global anti-money laundering risks across 203 countries using advanced statistical methods and machine learning. Provides evidence-based policy frameworks for international AML/CFT cooperation, regional coordination strategies, and strategic intervention targeting.

An open-source dataset of synthetic power quality disturbances (PQD), ideal for training and validating machine learning models. Signals are generated using established mathematical models from scientific literature, with parameter ranges conforming to the IEEE 1159 standard. Includes a Python analysis framework for statistical exploration.

A security framework for Hinglish chatbots that detects and prevents prompt injection attacks using rule-based and machine learning methods. It preprocesses code-mixed text, identifies malicious inputs, and ensures safe, reliable, and real-time AI interactions in bilingual environments.
Tech Soft 3D tutorials of python CAD framework for machine learning development. Requires HOOPS AI
Small classic machine learning framework written in C++
This repository contains all of my data science projects and machine learning analysis and modeling through EDA reports using CRISP-DM Framework
The PennyLane-Qrack plugin integrates the Qrack quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.

An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations
A Machine Learning Framework for Agricultural  Decision Support

An explainable machine learning framework for predicting compressive and flexural strengths of CNT-reinforced composites using Random Forest and XGBoost. Includes preprocessing scripts, model training, parity plots, ICE-based interpretability, and evaluation metrics.
Hybrid quantum-classical machine learning framework that runs on real quantum computers - bridge between quantum computing and AI.
An opinionated machine learning framework.

A comprehensive educational repository featuring "from-scratch" implementations of fundamental machine learning, deep learning, and reinforcement learning algorithms in Python, designed to illustrate the mathematical core of models without reliance on high-level frameworks.

A lightweight and modular Model Extractor tool for loading, analyzing, and exporting machine-learning models. Supports extracting model layers, parameters, weights, metadata, and architecture summaries from frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow. Ideal for ML engineers who need to inspect, debug, convert, or document model structures.

A foundational MLOps framework designed to operationalize the machine learning lifecycle using MLflow. This project establishes a standardized pipeline for experiment tracking, model versioning, and reproducible deployment.

Today, I explored how to build interactive AI applications using the Gradio framework  a powerful tool that allows you to create simple, shareable web interfaces for your machine learning and Generative AI models.

Mapping Alternate Scenarios of Forest Intactness (MASFI) is a cloud-based machine learning framework. It uses XGBoost regression and remote sensing data such as GEDI LiDAR to create high-resolution maps and statistics, supporting protected area planning and management.
Integrative Multi-Omics and Machine Learning Framework for Alzheimers Disease Risk Gene Identification and Early Diagnosis

An open-source Python framework that integrates machine learning interatomic  potentials (MLIPs) with a tailored batched optimization strategy, enabling rapid,  unbiased structure prediction across the full density range
The Unified Disease Prediction System is a streamlined machine learning-based framework designed to predict Heart Disease, Parkinsons Disease, and Diabetes through a single, user-friendly interface.

We present a comprehensive physics-informed machine learning frameworkPhysics-Guided Equation Discovery (PGED)that discovers a full, interpretable dynamical equation for the geomagnetic Dst index using only its historical time series. Trained on 139,872 hourly measurements, PGED recovers an 11-term sparse ordinary differential equation that.
A comprehensive machine learning framework for quantitative trading strategies
Hybrid machine learning framework for analyzing industrial IoT data, combining clustering and classification to identify machine behavior patterns and detect underperforming equipment.

This is a Python-based web application, built with the Flask framework, that serves as a Fertilizer Recommendation System. It uses a Decision Tree machine learning algorithm to predict the required fertilizer based on user-provided soil and crop data.

This project is a web-based application developed using Python's Flask framework that utilizes Machine Learning to provide personalized medicine, diet, and precaution recommendations based on user-inputted symptoms. The system is designed to act as a preliminary health advisory tool.
A framework to serve various generative AIs and other machine learning functions via WebSocket and JSONRPC.
Machine learning framework written in C.

PiXie Ops - Lightweight devops framework on top of Kubernetes & Terraform (OpenTofu) which simplifies cloud-native deployment to the same complexity level as Docker Compose. Ideal for demo's and proof-of-concepts in AI, machine learning pipelines and RAG. Works locally on Kind and in cloud on Azure via push. Can pull images, but does not do CI/CD

A machine learning project to predict and classify high-risk drug interactions for enhanced pharmaceutical safety. The model provides a technical framework for drug risk assessment by utilizing features like salt composition, side effects, and drug descriptions.
A lightweight, feature-engineered machine learning framework (FEIIDS) for real-time IoT intrusion detection, ensuring high accuracy and low computational cost.
A Framework for Developing Robust Machine Learning Models in Harsh Environments

The Context-Aware LSTM Framework for Intelligent News Categorization and Real-Time Dispatch is an end-to-end machine learning project for classifying news articles into four categories (World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech). It utilizes a trained LSTM model (or a Logistic Regression/SVM model combined with TF-IDF, based on the joblib pipeline)
PArallel Distributed Deep LEarning: Machine Learning Framework from Industrial Practice &

An angle calculator that is based on google's open source machine learning framework "mediapipe" that takes in a footage of a person walking and calculates different types of angles at each frame throughout the video. This is necessary for physicians to diagnose certain locomative related diseases.
A Rust machine learning framework.
The Cognitive Era in JavaScript  A TypeScript-first Machine Learning framework for modern JS environments. Built for React, Vite, and Node.js.
Developed a comprehensive weather pattern analysis framework by integrating machine learning models with geospatia
A Python modular framework for backtesting equity trading strategies with full performance analytics and "plug and play" strategies, including machine learning strategies.
ML + bioinformatics project for breast cancer subtype classification and biomarker discovery
NeXt4ACP is a novel stacked framework that integrates both machine learning and deep learning components for accurate ACP identification.
MULTI-evolve: a machine learning-guided end-to-end framework for engineering hyperactive multi-mutant proteins

A collection of end-to-end machine learning projects showcasing my skills in data preprocessing, feature engineering, model building, evaluation, and deployment. Each project is designed to demonstrate real-world problem-solving, statistical reasoning, and model interpretability using industry-standard tools and frameworks.
A collection of Machine Learning and Deep Learning projects implemented with frameworks including PyTorch and scikit-learn.

ChatGPT said:  An AI-driven framework that optimizes crop selection and water management using climate, soil, and rainfall data. It leverages machine learning to recommend sustainable, region-specific crops and predict water availability, promoting climate-resilient and resource-efficient farming practices.
GoMLX: An Accelerated Machine Learning Framework For Go

Machine learning framework predicting U.S. county-level opioid cost per capita (20132023) by integrating Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) levers and Social Determinants of Health (SDOH). Includes data pipelines, simulation code, and reproducible figures.
A collection of AI-driven applications and experiments built using Next.js, Python  and  machine learning frameworks
A modular machine learning framework for budget execution & data analysis built in Python with Scikit, XGBoost, PyTorch, and TensorFlow.
A comprehensive collection of practical machine learning examples using popular frameworks and libraries.

This project focuses on interpreting and explaining complex tree-based machine learning models using two powerful model-explainability frameworks: SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations) and LIME (Local Interpretable Model-Agnostic Explanations).

This repo features the code, input and output files for my undergraduate thesis titled "Design and optimization of an integrated computational and machine learning framework to detect functional variants and elucidate their contributions to biological pathways".
A neural network architecture for Machine Learning driven Data Quality Monitoring (DQM) framework in collider Experiments

This repository contains Machine learning framework for cancer drug discovery integrating QSAR modelling, ensemble learning, and transfer learning to predict adverse drug events and identify safe lead compounds. Implements molecular descriptor generation, data segmentation, and DNN-based safety modelling for drug development.

A web application that predicts disease likelihood from patient input using a machine learning model and exposes the model via a Django web app (REST API + web UI).   Built with Python, scikit-learn, pandas (model), and Django + Django REST Framework (backend & API). Ideal as a small end-to-end demo for healthcare/ML portfolios.
Transformers: the model-definition framework for state-of-the-art machine learning models in text, vision, audio, and multimodal models, for both inference and training.

Official implementation of our paper "Unsupervised Active Learning via Natural Feature Progressive Framework", currently under review at IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI)
A twolayer security framework is proposed for Internet of Vehicles (IoV) environments that combines lightweight cryptography with a machine learningbased Network Intrusion Detection System (NIDS).

Portfolio Optimization is a data science project that creates investment portfolios to maximize returns and manage risk using mean-variance optimization and machine learning. It features customizable workflows and frameworks like PyPortfolioOpt, designed for finance students and early-career data scientists.

PanARGMiner: Pan-genomic Antimicrobial Resistance Gene Miner is a machine learning framework for selecting key antimicrobial resistance features from large-scale genomic data with high accuracy and interpretability.

End-to-end implementations of modern Artificial Intelligence systems  spanning classical machine learning, deep neural networks, generative models, and agentic architectures. Built with industry-grade frameworks and designed for scalable experimentation, and real-world deployment across data-driven applications.

El propsito de esta actividad es que los estudiantes investiguen cuatro casos de uso relevantes de Machine Learning Supervisado y presenten sus hallazgos dentro de una aplicacin web utilizando Flask como framework backend y Jinja2 para la visualizacin en un template HTML.
Project for Applied Machine Learning 2, attempting to discover optimal noise profiles through an uncertainty-aware multi-generator evolutionary framework for GANs.
MediaPipe is a cross-platform framework for building multimodal applied machine learning pipelines

This project builds a machine-learningdriven decision engine that detects fraudulent financial transactions and quantifies its business impact. It forms the foundation of a scalable risk intelligence framework.

This project builds an AI-powered system that predicts employee burnout risk, explains key contributing factors, and provides actionable workload optimization strategies. It combines machine learning, explainable AI (XAI), and optimization algorithms to help organizations maintain workforce health and productivity.

Tywra ML is a front-end machine learning website built using the React.js library and the Next.js framework. This website was created as a simple project while also continuing advanced learning of JavaScript.

Comparative analysis of machine learning classifiers on the UCI Bank Marketing dataset using the CRISP-DM framework. Models include Logistic Regression, KNN, Decision Tree, and SVM, with tuning and class imbalance handling for improved F1 and ROC-AUC.
MLPro - The Integrative Middleware Framework for Standardized Machine Learning in Python

A next-generation AutoML construction framework that lets developers, researchers, and ML engineers design, evolve, and orchestrate machine learning pipelines as modular systems  not pre-built black boxes.
Federated Multi-Task Learning Framework for Privacy-Preserving Predictive Maintenance in CNC Machines

A.M.S.A.T (Android Malware Static Analysis Tool), a lightweight, command-line tool designed for rapid triage of Android applications using explainable heuristics rather than machine learning or deep taint analysis. Built on the Androguard framework.

An end-to-end NLP pipeline that benchmarks Classical Machine Learning, Embedding-based models, and Fine-Tuned Transformers to detect fake news ,balancing accuracy, interpretability, and real-world scalability.
